title: Rihanna pregnant rumours rubbished with bikini and blunt video
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Rihanna is cool. We know this.

But somehow, she just keeps getting cooler, and we simply must bow down.

The 31-year-old killed us and brought us back to life with a slow-mo Instagram video, showing her strutting in a bikini while smoking a blunt.

Rihanna walked barefoot wearing a high-cut black bikini and a sheer floor-length cover-up that trailed along behind her as she gave a walk that Naomi Campbell would be proud off.

Donning sunglasses, clutching a bag and holding a blunt between her lips, the Work singer hit her point before twirling and looking to camera – and reminding us all what a boss she is.

A queen (Picture: Rihanna/Instagram)

She has the turn and look mastered (Picture: Rihanna/Instagram)

And fans were truly mesmerised.

True Blood actress Rutina Wesley wrote: ‘Damn I jus passed out [sic]’ while Tiffany Pollard left a string of fire emojis under the video.

Meanwhile, others said that Riri was a prime example of ‘big d*** energy’ and we have to agree.

Others speculated that the video was a way to rubbish those pregnancy rumours, as her washboard stomach clearly isn’t forming a bump.

Rihanna admitted it’s her dream to be a mum (Picture: Roy Rochlin/Getty Images)

Rihanna is dating Hassan Jameel (Picture: Josiah Kamau/BuzzFoto via Getty Images)

Rihanna predicted that those rumours would reignite after her interview with Vogue, when Anna Wintour asked: ‘Do you hope to have a baby soon?’

The Only Girl In The World singer said: ‘I don’t think about stuff like that. But, I don’t know…God’s plan.

‘I look forward to all of the pregnancy rumors after this interview.’

Rihanna has since defended Anna’s question, telling Extra: ‘A lot of women get very defensive. It’s personal. It’s our bodies. And, of course, it’s our time. And it’s not necessarily everyone’s dream to be a mom, but it’s mine, so I’m fine.

‘Anna just wants to know what the people want to know.’

Advertisement

Rihanna is in a relationship with Saudi billionaire Hassan Jameel, and told the fashion bible that it is ‘going really well’.

Yeah, we’re happy for you, but Riri – where is the album?!
